content.raw:
I started working on this but I'm not sure I like the end result :slight_frown:. The issue is that there's no good way to determine the degrees of freedom of a joint from a system yet. So there is no easy way to prevent a mismatch between the size of the `JointForceCmd` component and the actual DOF of the joint.

I propose leaving this as is for now and creating a new PR that makes it easy to query the DOF of a joint and then add this feature.
